name: Tower of Conquest
subtitle: Tower of Conquest
desc: A nameless tower has appeared in the Sea of Chaos. Will you conquer the power that lies dormant within... or become one of them...
desc_tips: Clear the assigned stages of the[The Fool's Journey]to unlock new contents.

name: Starter Quest
subtitle: Spiral of Destinies

name: Beginner's Ceremony
subtitle: Beginner's Ceremony
desc:
The slumbering Sea of Chaos
awakens upon the Voyager's arrival.
Prepare for various events and 
set sail towards the shining beacons!
desc_tips: Participate in the series of events to get SSR characters, Hope Luxites, Secret Fates, furniture, and other rewards.

name: ★ Seven-Day Promise
subtitle: 7-Day Promise
desc: Sign in for 7 days to earn amazing rewards.
desc_tips: During the event, log in for 7 days in total to get Hope Luxites, Castalia, Endurance Potions, and other rewards.

name: The Uncrowned
subtitle: Spiral of Destinies
desc: Heavy is the head who wears the crown.
desc_tips: During the event period, enter the Spiral of Destinies and complete quests to earn rich rewards!

name: The Fool's Journey
subtitle: The Fool's Journey
desc:
Voyager, time to set sail! 

Chapter 7 - Knight's Lance is now available. 

Chapter 8 - The Hour of Doom is now available. 

Clear Stage 8-5 to unlock new feature: Gear Engraving.
desc_tips: Complete Chapter 6 of [The Fool's Journey] and reach a certain Voyager Level to unlock new chapters.

name: The Fool's Journey
subtitle: The Fool's Journey
desc:
Grandmaster, time to set sail! 

Chapter 9 - The Birdcage is now available. 

Chapter 10 - The Hanged Men is now available.
desc_tips: Complete Chapter 8 of [The Fool's Journey] and reach a certain Voyager Level to unlock new chapters.

name: Elysium Party
desc: Maitha is throwing a grand banquet to welcome her new friends to Elysium. But things are not going as smoothly as planned…
desc_tips: During the event, take part in the time-limited activity [Fight! Elysium Party] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for numerous enhancement items.

name: Flame and Rebirth
desc:
Unknown creatures have appeared in the Sea of Chaos,
heralding the shadow of Calamity…
desc_tips: During the event, take part in the time-limited activity [Flame and Power of Rebirth] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for numerous enhancement items.

subtitle: The Fool's Journey
desc:

Set out, Voyager!
desc_tips: Complete Chapter 10 of [The Fool's Journey] and reach a certain Voyager Level to unlock new chapters.

name: Fireside Chat
desc:
Forget all the fatigue, gather around the hearth, and share the warmth of laughter and tales of past fervor.
A bit of bragging won't hurt. If push comes to shove, just brace yourself!
desc_tips: During the event, participate in the limited-time event [Fireside Chat] to win plenty of enhancement items.

name: Bind your phone number
desc: Leader, binding your phone number ensures more security for your mercenary group management.

name: Battle For Spring's Will
subtitle: Try new mechanics!
desc_tips: During the event, participate in the limited-time event [Battle For Spring's Will] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for plenty of enhancement items.

name: Happy New Year
subtitle: Convallaria Gifts
desc: Say goodbye to the old and welcome the new with amazing gifts, including <color=#FEF5E3>Selection Epic Characters</color>, <color=#FEF5E3>Hope Luxite</color>, and <color=#FEF5E3>Random Legendary Gear</color>!
desc_tips: During the event, complete designated quests to earn great rewards!

name: Sparkle! Elysium Revived!
desc: Partners are preparing for the new holiday of Elysium. Come decorate Elysium and exchange blessings!
desc_tips: During the event, participate in the event daily to claim [Emulational Can] for a lucky draw, winning limited furniture, Secret Fate, Hope Luxite, and other rewards.

name: Sparkle! Elysium Revived!
desc: Partners are preparing for the new holiday of Elysium. Come decorate Elysium and exchange blessings!

desc: Leader, let's set sail!

name: Tower of Adversity
subtitle: The Deepest Challenge
desc:
Beneath the vortex of the Sea of Chaos, the ancient seals have begun to loosen.

The power from "Inversion", the other side of the world, has now revealed itself…
desc_tips:
[Tower of Conquest]
Clear Floor 5 to unlock

name: Elysium Welcome Gift
editor_name: 回归系列活动 - 首日大礼
desc:
Boss and Faycal talk every day about when you will return, 
and Maitha has a lot of things to tell you… 
Plus, there's a mountain of gifts that everyone has prepared for you. Come take a look!
desc_tips:
Leader, welcome back to Sword of Convallaria!

Partners have prepared a variety of return events for you, including the [Elysium Welcome Gift] shown on this page as well as the [Awakening Blessing] and [Port-return Gift] on the Elysium home page. Participate in the series of return events to gain great rewards easily!

※ The [Port-return Gift] will be available on the 7th day of your return.

name: Traders from Desert
subtitle: Everything Has Its Price
desc: As for him who holds the scales, has he calculated his own worth?
desc_tips: During the event, participate in the limited-time event [Traders from Desert] to win limited avatar frames and furniture and exchange for plenty of enhancement items.

name: Sand-made Scales
subtitle: Spiral of Destinies
desc: Participate in new stories to obtain

name: Sand-made Scales
subtitle: A new story in Spiral of Destinies begins!
desc: The sweat dripping on the dock, the swaying armor in the cargo, the scarf tightened in the shadow… Amid the hustle and bustle, the coins are pocketed, and a bundle of lilies from the valley is placed on one end of the scale.
